children.name: S2E: Strategy to Execute
children.description: Defines corporate strategy, manages investment portfolio, roadmaps, benefits and architecture governance.

children.name: S2E_01: Strategy & Ambition Setting
children.description: Define corporate and divisional strategy, strategic themes, long-term ambition and priorities

children.name: S2E_01_01: Market & Competitive Analysis
children.description: Analyze market, competition, customer trends, and industry dynamics

children.name: S2E_01_01_01: Collect Market & Industry Data
children.description: Collect market size, growth, competitor, and industry data
children.trigger: Strategy cycle start / annual planning cycle
children.notes: Input from external sources, consultants, internal research

children.name: S2E_01_01_03: Analyze Customer & Segment Trends
children.description: Analyze customer behavior, segments, and needs
children.notes: Input from NPS, CSS, sales, research

children.name: S2E_01_01_04: Identify Market Opportunities & Threats
children.description: Synthesize analysis into opportunities and risks

children.name: S2E_01_02: Strategic Ambition & Vision Definition
children.description: Define long-term ambition, vision, and strategic positioning

children.name: S2E_01_02_01: Define Strategic Ambition & North Star
children.description: Define long-term ambition, purpose, and north-star metrics

children.name: S2E_01_02_02: Define Strategic Positioning
children.description: Define how the company wants to compete and win

children.name: S2E_01_02_03: Define Long-Term Value Creation Objectives
children.description: Define growth, profitability, and value creation goals

children.name: S2E_01_03: Strategic Themes & Priorities Definition
children.description: Define strategic focus areas and transformation themes

children.name: S2E_01_03_01: Identify Strategic Themes
children.description: Identify key transformation and focus areas
children.notes: e.g., Network, Digital, CX, Cost, Data

children.name: S2E_01_03_02: Define Strategic Objectives per Theme
children.description: Define objectives for each strategic theme

children.name: S2E_01_03_03: Define Success Metrics per Theme
children.description: Define how success will be measured

children.name: S2E_01_04: Group & Division Strategy Alignment
children.description: Align divisional strategies with group strategy

children.name: S2E_01_04_01: Collect Divisional / Country Strategies
children.description: Collect bottom-up strategies from divisions and countries

children.name: S2E_01_04_02: Assess Strategic Alignment
children.description: Assess alignment to group ambition and themes

children.name: S2E_01_04_03: Resolve Strategic Misalignments
children.description: Align and adjust strategies with divisions/countries

children.name: S2E_01_04_04: Confirm Group & Division Strategy Coherence
S2E_01_05: Strategy Communication & Cascade
children.description: Communicate and cascade strategy across the organization

children.name: S2E_01_05_02: Communicate Strategy to Leadership
children.description: Present and align strategy with leadership layers

children.name: S2E_01_05_04: Embed Strategy into Management Processes
children.description: Embed strategy into planning, portfolio, and KPI cycles

children.name: S2E_02: Business Planning & Target Setting
children.description: Translate strategy into multi-year and annual plans, budgets, and performance targets

children.name: S2E_02_01: Multi-Year Strategic Planning
children.description: Define multi-year business plans and strategic roadmaps

children.name: S2E_02_01_01: Define Planning Assumptions & Scenarios

children.name: S2E_02_01_02: Build Multi-Year Financial & Volume Plan

children.name: S2E_02_01_03: Iterate & Align Multi-Year Plan
children.description: Iterate plan with GMB and countries/functions

children.name: S2E_02_02: Annual Business Planning & Budgeting

children.name: S2E_02_02_01: Issue Annual Planning & Budget Guidelines
children.description: Issue planning instructions, targets, and templates

children.name: S2E_02_02_04: Challenge & Iterate Annual Plan
children.description: Review, challenge, and iterate plans with management

children.name: S2E_02_02_05: Approve Annual Plan & Budget
children.description: Formal approval of annual plan and budget

children.name: S2E_02_03: Target Setting & KPI Definition
children.description: Define financial, operational, and strategic targets

children.name: S2E_02_03_01: Define Financial Targets

children.name: S2E_02_03_02: Define Operational & Strategic Targets
children.description: Define service, quality, productivity and transformation targets

children.name: S2E_02_03_03: Align Targets Across Organization

children.name: S2E_02_04: Country / Function Planning Alignment
children.description: Align country and function plans to group targets

children.name: S2E_02_04_01: Collect Country / Function Plans

children.name: S2E_02_04_02: Check Consistency vs Targets
children.description: Check plans against strategic and financial targets

children.name: S2E_02_04_04: Freeze Final Plans
children.description: Freeze baseline plans for the year

children.name: S2E_02_05: Plan Consolidation & Approval
children.description: Consolidate plans and run approval governance

children.name: S2E_03: Initiative & Portfolio Management
children.description: Capture, prioritize, and manage the strategic initiative and transformation portfolio

children.name: S2E_03_01: Initiative Demand Intake
children.description: Capture ideas, initiatives, and change requests from business

children.name: S2E_03_01_01: Collect Initiative Ideas

children.name: S2E_03_01_02: Register Initiatives in Portfolio System
children.description: Register initiatives with basic scope, sponsor, and objectives

children.name: S2E_03_01_03: Assign Business Owner & Sponsor
children.description: Assign accountable business owner and executive sponsor

children.name: S2E_03_02: Business Case Pre-Evaluation

children.name: S2E_03_02_01: Pre-Screen for Strategic Fit
children.description: Check alignment to strategy and themes

children.name: S2E_03_02_02: Estimate Value, Cost & Complexity
children.description: High-level estimate of benefits, costs, and complexity

children.name: S2E_03_02_03: Classify Initiative Type
children.description: Classify as growth, efficiency, compliance, tech, etc.

children.name: S2E_03_03: Prioritization & Portfolio Balancing
children.description: Prioritize initiatives and balance the portfolio by value, risk, and capacity

children.name: S2E_03_03_01: Score Initiatives Against Criteria
children.description: Score initiatives on value, risk, urgency, and strategy fit

children.name: S2E_03_03_02: Prioritize Initiatives
children.description: Rank initiatives based on scores and constraints

children.name: S2E_03_03_03: Balance Portfolio (Value / Risk / Capacity)
children.description: Balance portfolio across themes, risk, and capacity

children.name: S2E_03_04: Roadmap & Dependency Management
children.description: Manage portfolio roadmap, dependencies, and sequencing

children.name: S2E_03_04_02: Identify Cross-Initiative Dependencies
children.description: Identify logical, technical, and business dependencies

children.name: S2E_03_05: Portfolio Governance & Reporting
children.description: Run portfolio reviews, reporting, and steering

children.name: S2E_03_05_01: Run Portfolio Review Governance
children.description: Run regular portfolio review boards (e.g., monthly/quarterly)

children.name: S2E_03_05_02: Track Portfolio Status & Health
children.description: Track progress, risks, and issues across portfolio

children.name: S2E_03_05_03: Escalate & Resolve Portfolio-Level Issues
children.description: Escalate conflicts, resource issues, or major risks

children.name: S2E_03_05_04: Communicate Portfolio Decisions
children.description: Communicate decisions to programs and stakeholders

children.name: S2E_04: Investment & Funding Management
children.description: Manage Capex/Opex governance, business cases, funding approvals, and benefits tracking

children.name: S2E_04_01: Business Case Development
children.description: Develop full business cases including costs, benefits, and risks

children.name: S2E_04_01_01: Define Business Case Scope & Objectives
children.description: Define scope, objectives, and success criteria for the business case
children.notes: Aligns with strategic theme and portfolio slot

children.name: S2E_04_01_02: Build Financial Model & Assumptions
children.description: Build cost, benefit, and cash-flow model

children.name: S2E_04_01_04: Finalize Business Case
children.description: Consolidate narrative, financials, and risks into final business case

children.name: S2E_04_02: Investment Review & Approval
children.description: Run investment committees and approval workflows

children.name: S2E_04_02_01: Prepare Investment Review Materials
children.description: Prepare decks and documents for investment committee

children.name: S2E_04_02_02: Run Investment Committee Review
children.description: Review, challenge, and discuss investment proposal

children.name: S2E_04_02_04: Communicate Investment Decision
children.description: Communicate decision to portfolio and program owners

children.name: S2E_04_03: Funding Allocation & Budget Release
children.description: Allocate funding and release budgets to programs

children.name: S2E_04_03_01: Allocate Budget to Program / Initiative
children.description: Allocate approved funding to cost centers / WBS

children.name: S2E_04_03_02: Release Funds per Phase or Milestone
children.description: Release funding based on phase gates or milestones

children.name: S2E_04_03_03: Set Up Financial Tracking Structure
children.description: Set up cost tracking, project codes, and controls

children.name: S2E_04_04: Benefits Tracking & Value Realization
children.description: Track benefits realization vs business case

children.description: Define benefit types, owners, and timeline

children.name: S2E_04_04_02: Track Benefits Realization
children.description: Track actual benefits vs plan during and after execution

children.name: S2E_04_04_03: Validate Benefits Achievement
children.description: Validate and sign off realized benefits

children.description: Trigger actions if benefits deviate from plan
children.notes: May include scope or execution changes

children.name: S2E_04_05: Investment Portfolio Performance Review
children.description: Review ROI, value delivery, and stop/continue decisions

children.name: S2E_04_05_01: Review Investment Portfolio Performance
children.description: Review ROI, value delivery, and performance across portfolio

children.name: S2E_04_05_02: Decide Continue / Stop / Re-scope Investments
S2E_04_05_03: Update Portfolio & Funding Plan

children.name: S2E_05: Program & Transformation Execution

children.name: S2E_05_01: Program Setup & Mobilization
children.description: Set up program governance, structure, and resourcing

children.name: S2E_05_01_01: Define Program Governance & Structure
children.description: Define program setup, governance bodies, roles, and cadence

children.name: S2E_05_01_02: Appoint Program Manager & Key Roles
children.description: Appoint program leadership and key roles

children.name: S2E_05_01_03: Define Program Scope, Plan & Roadmap
children.description: Define detailed scope, milestones, and roadmap

children.name: S2E_05_02_01: Execute Projects & Workstreams
children.description: Execute delivery across projects and workstreams

children.name: S2E_05_02_03: Manage Vendors & External Partners
children.description: Manage external delivery partners and contracts

children.name: S2E_05_03: Milestone & Dependency Management
children.description: Manage milestones, critical path, and interdependencies

children.name: S2E_05_04: Risk, Issue & Change Management
children.description: Manage risks, issues, and scope changes

children.description: Define and maintain group-wide KPI tree and definitions

children.description: Assign owners and governance for each KPI

children.description: Prepare decks and data for performance reviews

children.name: S2E_06_02_02: Run GMB / Ops / Business Reviews

children.description: Communicate performance internally and to stakeholders

S2E_07: M&A and Strategic Partnerships

children.name: S2E_07_03_03: Sign Transaction & Close Deal

O2D: Order to Delivery
children.description: Owns physical execution of shipments: pickup, hubs, gateways, customs, linehaul, last mile, POD and returns.

children.name: O2D_01: Order Intake & Release
children.description: Receive and prepare commercial orders for physical execution

children.name: O2D_01_01: Order Reception & Pre-Advice
children.description: Receive order data and pre-advice from Lead to Cash

children.name: O2D_01_01_01: Receive Order Data from L2C
children.description: Receive commercial order payload and references (service, contract, payer).

children.name: O2D_01_01_02: Receive Pre-Advice / Manifest
children.description: Receive pre-advice for bulk injections (files/API) including shipment identifiers.
children.outcome: Pre-advice stored and linked to expected arrivals
children.notes: Bulk shipper / EDI / API pre-advice support

children.name: O2D_01_01_03: Acknowledge Order Receipt
children.description: Send technical/business acknowledgement to upstream channel.

children.description: Assign handling class (standard/oversize/special) based on attributes.
children.notes: Drives handling class and network treatment

children.name: O2D_01_01_05: Queue Order for Physical Intake
children.description: Place order into intake queue awaiting physical injection event.

children.name: O2D_01_02: Physical Injection & Acceptance
children.description: Accept shipment via pickup, drop-off, or direct injection

children.description: Register first physical event at injection point (drop-off, hub injection, depot).
children.notes: First physical control point in network

children.description: Match scanned shipment ID to order/pre-advice record.
children.notes: Links physical parcel to commercial order

children.description: Accept parcel based on basic admissibility checks (label present, ID readable).

children.name: O2D_01_02_04: Reject Shipment at Intake
children.description: Reject parcel when non-admissible (unknown ID, prohibited, missing label).

children.name: O2D_01_02_05: Capture Handover for Pickups
children.description: Register handover scan from pickup execution into first node.

children.name: O2D_01_03: Data Validation & Enrichment
children.description: Validate and enrich label, address, service, customs data

children.description: Validate ID format, label readability, duplication, integrity.

children.description: Validate delivery address completeness and service option compatibility.

children.description: Check required customs data presence for cross-border shipments.

children.description: Enrich site codes, geo, customer refs via reference data services.

children.name: O2D_01_03_05: Apply Quality Gate Outcome
children.description: Set pass/fail/conditional pass with reason codes.

children.name: O2D_01_03_06: Capture Weight & Dimensions
children.description: Capture measured weight and dimensions (or ingest from dimensioning system) for rating accuracy.

children.name: O2D_01_03_07: Validate Weight & Dimension Data
children.description: Validate measurement completeness, plausibility, and unit standards; flag anomalies.

children.description: Calculate chargeable/volumetric weight per tariff rules and store the result.

children.name: O2D_01_03_09: Apply W&D Discrepancy Rule
children.description: Compare declared vs measured values; trigger correction/approval workflow if thresholds exceeded.

children.description: Determine the first physical node (hub/service center/gateway) based on injection point and service.

children.description: Assign routing/sort keys used by nodes (next-node, lane, bag sort code).

children.description: Notify shipper/platform of acceptance/admission where required.

children.description: Resolve by correcting data, relabel, or re-processing.

children.description: Execute operational handling of rejected shipments (return to shipper, hold, dispose).

children.description: Close case with final status and audit trail.

children.description: Resolve W&D discrepancy via re-measure, approval, customer communication, or correction before billing.

children.description: Capture and validate weight/dimensions for rating and billing accuracy

children.description: Classify initiatives (run, optimize, transform, innovate, mandatory)

children.description: Define mandatory structure for business cases (cost, benefit, risk, timing)

children.description: Classify benefits (cost, revenue, cash, service, risk) and map to P&L

children.name: D2O_08_06_04: Design Benefits Tracking & Baseline Methodology
children.description: Define how baselines are set and benefits are measured

children.name: D2O_08_06_05: Integrate Benefits into Performance & Steering Cycles
children.description: Ensure benefits are reviewed in MBR/QBR and portfolio reviews

children.name: D2O_08_06_06: Define Post-Implementation Review & Value Validation
children.description: Define how value is validated after implementation

children.description: Define CI skill levels for frontline, managers, experts

children.description: Design training modules and certification levels

children.description: Define expected leadership behaviors and routines

children.name: D2O_08_08_04: Design CI Community & Knowledge Sharing Model
children.description: Design communities of practice and CI networks

children.description: Embed CI expectations into objectives and reviews

children.name: D2O_08_08_06: Design Recognition, Awards & Storytelling Mechanisms
children.description: Design how CI success is celebrated and communicated

children.name: D2O_08_08_07: Define CI Maturity Model & Assessments
children.description: Define maturity levels and assessment methodology

children.name: D2O_08_08_08: Design CI Coaching & Mentoring Model
children.description: Define coaching structure for leaders and teams

children.name: D2O_08_08_09: Approve CI Capability & Culture Framework

children.name: D2O_08_09_04: Govern IP, Data & Commercial Terms
P2R: Problem to Resolution
children.description: Manages incidents, crises, root cause analysis, service recovery and prevention across operations and IT.

children.name: P2R_01: Problem Detection & Intake
children.description: Detect, capture, and register problems from all channels

children.name: P2R_01_01: Proactive Detection & Monitoring
children.description: Detect problems via control tower, KPIs, scans, and AI alerts

children.name: P2R_01_01_01: Monitor Control Tower Alerts & Rules
children.description: Continuously monitor predefined operational and service alerts

children.name: P2R_01_01_02: Detect KPI & SLA Breaches
children.description: Detect breaches in OTD, NOP, backlog, cycle time, etc.

children.name: P2R_01_01_03: Detect Scan Gaps & Process Breaks
children.description: Detect missing or inconsistent scan events

children.name: P2R_01_01_04: Detect ETA Risk & Network Congestion
children.description: Predict late deliveries or congestion before they happen

children.name: P2R_01_01_05: Detect Automation & System Anomalies
children.description: Detect abnormal behavior in sorters, WMS, TMS, robots

children.name: P2R_01_01_06: Detect Recurrent Pattern & Systemic Issues
children.description: Identify repeating issues via analytics & AI

children.name: P2R_01_01_07: Correlate & Deduplicate Alerts
children.description: Group multiple alerts into one problem context

children.name: P2R_01_01_08: Create Problem Signal for Case Intake
children.description: Convert alerts into a standardized problem signal

children.name: P2R_01_02: Customer & Partner Reported Issues Intake
children.description: Capture problems reported by customers, partners, and OOH points

children.name: P2R_01_02_01: Receive Customer Contact via Any Channel
children.description: Receive issue via phone, email, chat, portal, API

children.name: P2R_01_02_02: Authenticate Customer & Identify Shipment/Account
children.description: Validate identity and locate relevant shipment or account

children.name: P2R_01_02_03: Capture Issue Description & Evidence
children.description: Capture problem type, description, photos, documents

children.name: P2R_01_02_04: Classify Issue Type & Urgency
children.description: Classify (delay, damage, loss, billing, customs, etc.)

children.name: P2R_01_02_05: Check for Existing Case / Duplicate
children.description: Avoid duplicate cases for same root problem

children.name: P2R_01_02_06: Create Customer Problem Case
children.description: Register the problem as an official case in the system

children.name: P2R_01_02_07: Acknowledge Receipt to Customer/Partner
children.description: Confirm case creation and expected response time

children.name: P2R_01_03: Operations & Network Reported Issues
children.description: Capture problems detected by hubs, gateways, depots, couriers

children.name: P2R_01_03_01: Detect Issue During Physical Handling
children.description: Damage, leakage, missing item, wrong label, blocked item detected

children.name: P2R_01_03_02: Detect Issue During Sortation or Induction
children.description: Detect missort, unreadable label, stuck item, automation jam

children.name: P2R_01_03_03: Detect Issue During Linehaul or Transport
children.description: Detect accident, delay, missing units, temperature breach

children.name: P2R_01_03_04: Detect Issue During Last Mile or Delivery Attempt
children.description: Detect access issue, customer not home, address problem

children.name: P2R_01_03_05: Capture Evidence (Photo, Scan, Comment)
children.description: Capture proof of issue in system or device

children.name: P2R_01_03_06: Classify Issue Type & Severity
children.description: Classify (loss, damage, delay, compliance, safety, etc.)

children.name: P2R_01_03_07: Check for Existing Case / Known Incident
children.description: Check if issue is part of bigger incident

children.name: P2R_01_03_08: Create Operations Problem Case
children.description: Register issue as formal problem case

children.name: P2R_01_04: IT & Systems Incident Intake
children.description: Capture IT, platform, integration, and automation incidents

children.name: P2R_01_04_01: Detect System or Application Outage
P2R_01_04_02: Detect Integration / API / EDI Failure
children.description: Partner or internal interface stops or sends errors

children.name: P2R_01_04_03: Detect Automation / PLC / Control System Failure
children.description: Sorter, robot, conveyor or WCS/PLC failure

children.name: P2R_01_04_04: Receive IT Incident Report from Users
children.description: User reports issue via service desk

children.name: P2R_01_04_05: Classify Incident Severity & Business Impact
children.description: Classify as P1/P2/P3 and assess ops impact

children.name: P2R_01_04_06: Check for Known Problem or Major Incident
children.description: Check if incident is already ongoing or known

children.name: P2R_01_04_07: Create IT Incident / Problem Case
children.description: Register incident in ITSM / problem system

children.name: P2R_01_04_08: Notify Control Tower & Impacted Operations
children.description: Ensure ops is aware of IT issue

children.name: P2R_01_05: Claims, Financial & Compliance Issue Intake
children.description: Capture claims, billing disputes, customs & compliance issues

children.name: P2R_01_05_01: Receive Claim, Dispute or Compliance Issue
children.description: Receive financial, legal, or compliance-related issue via any channel

children.name: P2R_01_05_02: Identify Shipment, Invoice or Case Context
children.description: Link issue to shipment, invoice, or customer account

children.name: P2R_01_05_03: Capture Claim or Issue Details & Evidence
children.description: Capture amounts, documents, photos, legal references

children.name: P2R_01_05_04: Classify Financial / Compliance Issue Type
children.description: Classify (damage, loss, billing, customs, sanction, etc.)

children.name: P2R_01_05_05: Check for Existing Case or Related Incident
children.description: Check if already covered by open case or incident

children.name: P2R_01_05_06: Create Claim / Financial / Compliance Case
children.description: Register official case in claims or case system

children.name: P2R_01_05_07: Acknowledge Receipt & Next Steps to Customer
children.description: Confirm case creation and expected resolution timeline

children.name: P2R_01_06: Problem Registration & Case Creation
children.description: Normalize, deduplicate, and register problems as cases

children.name: P2R_01_06_01: Normalize Incoming Problem Signals
children.description: Standardize data structure from all intake channels

children.name: P2R_01_06_02: Deduplicate Similar or Repeated Issues
children.description: Detect and merge duplicate cases or signals

children.name: P2R_01_06_03: Correlate Issues into Major Incident or Master Case
children.description: Group related issues under one master incident

children.name: P2R_01_06_04: Link Sub-Cases to Master Case
children.description: Link local or customer cases to master incident

children.name: P2R_01_06_05: Assign Case Ownership & SLA Clock
children.description: Assign responsible owner and start SLA timers

children.name: P2R_01_06_06: Route Case to Correct Resolution Workflow
children.description: Route to ops, IT, finance, claims, or customs workflow

children.name: P2R_01_06_07: Notify Stakeholders & Open Resolution Loop
children.description: Notify relevant teams and start resolution process

children.name: P2R_02: Triage, Prioritization & Containment
children.description: Assess impact, prioritize, and apply immediate containment

children.name: P2R_02_01: Impact & Severity Assessment
children.description: Assess business, customer, financial, and regulatory impact

children.name: P2R_02_01_01: Identify Impacted Shipments, Customers & Sites
children.description: Determine scope of affected volume, customers, and locations

children.name: P2R_02_01_02: Assess Service Level & Customer Promise Impact
children.description: Evaluate SLA breaches, ETA risks, and CX impact

children.name: P2R_02_01_03: Estimate Financial & Cost Impact
children.description: Estimate refunds, claims, penalties, overtime, lost revenue

children.name: P2R_02_01_04: Assess Regulatory, Safety & Reputational Risk
children.description: Assess customs, safety, legal, or PR implications

children.name: P2R_02_01_05: Assess Network Propagation Risk
children.description: Determine if issue can spread to other nodes or countries

children.name: P2R_02_01_06: Determine Overall Severity Level
children.description: Assign severity level (e.g., S1–S4 or P1–P4)

children.name: P2R_02_01_07: Update Case with Impact & Severity Profile
children.description: Update master case with impact and severity

children.name: P2R_02_02: Prioritization & SLA Classification
children.description: Assign priority, urgency, and resolution targets

children.name: P2R_02_02_01: Apply Priority Rules & Business Criticality
children.description: Apply rules based on severity, key customers, legal or safety risk

children.name: P2R_02_02_02: Check Contractual & Regulatory SLA Obligations
children.description: Check if special SLA or legal timelines apply

children.name: P2R_02_02_03: Assign Target Response & Resolution Time
children.description: Set clocks for response, workaround, and final resolution

children.name: P2R_02_02_04: Reorder Case Queues & Worklists
children.description: Re-sequence work queues based on new priorities

children.name: P2R_02_02_05: Trigger Escalation if Required
children.description: Escalate to management or crisis mode if thresholds exceeded

children.name: P2R_02_02_06: Update Case with Priority & SLA Commitments
children.description: Persist priority and SLA in case system

children.name: P2R_02_03: Major Incident & Crisis Management
children.description: Trigger and manage major incidents and crisis mode

children.name: P2R_02_03_01: Declare Major Incident / Crisis Mode
children.description: Formally declare crisis and switch governance model

children.name: P2R_02_03_02: Assemble War Room & Crisis Team
children.description: Bring together ops, IT, comms, commercial, legal

children.name: P2R_02_03_03: Establish Incident Command Structure
children.description: Define incident commander, leads, and roles

children.name: P2R_02_03_04: Define Crisis Objectives & Decision Principles
P2R_02_03_05: Run Situation Assessment & Action Planning Cycles
P2R_02_03_06: Coordinate Cross-Country / Cross-Function Actions
children.description: Align multiple countries, hubs, IT, partners

children.name: P2R_02_03_07: Escalate to Group / External Stakeholders if Needed
children.description: Escalate to DHL Group, authorities, media if needed

children.name: P2R_02_03_08: Decide Exit from Crisis Mode
P2R_02_04: Containment & Damage Limitation Actions
children.description: Execute temporary actions to stop further impact

children.name: P2R_02_04_01: Block or Throttle Upstream Volume
children.description: Temporarily stop or limit new volume entering affected nodes

children.name: P2R_02_04_02: Reroute Shipments to Alternate Nodes or Paths
children.description: Divert shipments to backup hubs, gateways, routes

children.name: P2R_02_04_03: Activate Manual or Degraded Mode Processes
P2R_02_04_04: Activate Backup Capacity & Resources
children.description: Bring in extra shifts, sites, linehaul, or partners

children.name: P2R_02_04_06: Protect Priority Customers & Shipments
children.description: Apply prioritization rules to key customers or regulated goods

children.name: P2R_02_04_07: Monitor Containment Effectiveness
children.description: Check if containment actions are working

children.name: P2R_02_05: Stakeholder Communication & Alignment
children.description: Align ops, IT, commercial, and management during incident

children.name: P2R_02_05_01: Identify Impacted Stakeholders & Audiences
children.description: Determine who needs to be informed (ops, IT, sales, customers, mgmt)

children.name: P2R_02_05_02: Prepare Core Situation Update & Messaging
children.description: Create consistent message: what happened, impact, actions, ETA

children.name: P2R_02_05_03: Brief Internal Operations & Country Teams
children.description: Inform countries, hubs, depots, IT about situation & instructions

children.name: P2R_02_05_04: Brief Commercial, Key Account & Customer Service Teams
children.description: Ensure customer-facing teams have same story

children.name: P2R_02_05_05: Proactively Inform Key Customers (If Required)
children.description: Send proactive updates to affected strategic customers

children.name: P2R_02_05_07: Manage External / Media / Authority Communication
children.description: Handle PR, regulator, or authority communication if needed

children.name: P2R_02_05_08: Maintain Regular Situation Update Cadence
children.description: Run regular update cycles during incident

children.name: P2R_02_06: Stabilization & Handover to Resolution
children.description: Ensure situation is stable before deep root cause fix

children.name: P2R_02_06_01: Confirm Service Stabilization
children.description: Confirm that containment actions have stopped further degradation

children.name: P2R_02_06_02: Decide Exit from Crisis / Emergency Mode
children.description: Formally switch back to normal governance

children.name: P2R_02_06_03: Define Resolution Workstreams & Owners
children.description: Define who fixes what (ops, IT, vendor, etc.)

children.name: P2R_02_06_04: Transfer Ownership to Resolution Teams
children.description: Handover from war room to normal resolution processes

children.name: P2R_02_06_05: Align Resolution Plan & Milestones
children.description: Agree timeline, milestones, and success criteria

children.name: P2R_02_06_06: Update Case Status & Governance Mode
P2R_03: Resolution Execution
children.description: Execute corrective actions to restore service

children.name: P2R_03_01: Operational Resolution Execution
children.description: Execute fixes in hubs, gateways, depots, linehaul, and last mile

children.name: P2R_03_01_01: Locate Affected Shipments / Units
children.description: Physically or logically locate impacted parcels, cages, or containers

children.name: P2R_03_01_02: Isolate & Secure Affected Items
children.description: Prevent further mixing, damage, or loss

children.name: P2R_03_01_03: Rework, Repack or Relabel Shipments
P2R_03_01_05: Re-dispatch or Re-book Transport
children.description: Book new linehaul or last mile transport

children.name: P2R_03_01_06: Recover Lost or Delayed Shipments
children.description: Actively search and recover missing or stuck shipments
